thread.title: ‘Jeopardy!’ contestant tricks Alex Trebek into saying ‘Turd Ferguson’
thread.title_full: ‘Jeopardy!’ contestant tricks Alex Trebek into saying ‘Turd Ferguson’

title: ‘Jeopardy!’ contestant tricks Alex Trebek into saying ‘Turd Ferguson’
text: ‘Jeopardy!’ contestant tricks Alex Trebek into saying ‘Turd Ferguson’ Friday, 18 September 2015 (16 minutes ago) A Jeopardy! contestant this week hilariously tricked Alex Trebek into saying the name ‘ Turd Ferguson ’ on the air during the show’s Final Jeopardy round. Here’s how it all went down. Going into the final round, a contestant named Talia was in third place with just $600 to her name. The other contestants, meanwhile, were sitting pretty with respective winnings of $12,600 and $7,600. With no real chance to emerge victorious, Talia decided she might as well have a little bit of fun instead of actually trying to answer the question. DON’T MISS: 10 more hidden features in iOS 9 Setting the stage, the final category was “Oscar-nominated songs” with the accompanying question reading as follows: “This song from a 1999 animated film about censorship had a A 'Jeopardy!' contestant is being hailed a hero for getting Alex Trebek to say Turd Ferguson on national television. Mara Montalbano (@maramontalbano) has the story.
